name: Pylon of the Sojourning Sun Temple
title: Sethos: Pylon of the Sojourning Sun Temple
in_play_description: After your Sethos loses Energy due to Black Kite's Enigma, gain 1 Energy. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Sethos to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Your Sethos gains 1 Energy.
After your Sethos loses Energy due to Black Kite's Enigma, gain 1 Energy. (Once per Round)
(You must have Sethos in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
